price: [Gog y Magog] no pudieron escalarla ni tampoco perforarla.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡطَٰعُوٓاْ أَن يَظۡهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ لَهُۥ نَقۡبٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: famā is'ṭāʿū an yaẓharūhu wamā is'taṭāʿū lahu naqban
